description:
Aggressive riding glasses built for the trail. With a large single lens, the Pangor help protect your eyes from trail debris and harsh UV. Outfitted with light a light lens, this version of the Pangor is designed to keep your eyes safe on low-light and night rides.

  • Fits medium faces best
  • Treated with a military grade anti-fog material. Anti-fog lenses perform best when clean. Simply wash the lenses with water and they’ll keep your vision clear. When not in use, store them in a warm, dry environment
  • Scratch-resistant polycarbonate lenses
  • 6-base lens curve provides great coverage without restricting air flow
  • Rubber temple tips and rubber nose pads offer a comfortable fit, that doesn’t shift around
  • Grilamid TR90 thermoplastic frames are flexible, durable and light
name: Ryders Eyewear Pangor Light Lens Sunglasses
